title: Intro to Investing
description: Learn the fundamentals of investing and building wealth.
coreConcepts: Understand risk vs reward
Learn the difference between stocks, bonds, and mutual funds
Importance of diversifying investments
Power of compound interest

quiz.question: What is one benefit of diversification?

title: Understanding Taxes
description: Master tax deductions, credits and filing strategies.
coreConcepts: Difference between tax credits and tax deductions
How tax brackets work
Common tax forms and filing statuses
Strategies to reduce taxable income legally

quiz.question: Which reduces your tax bill dollar-for-dollar?

title: Budgeting Basics
description: Create and maintain an effective personal budget.
coreConcepts: Track your income and expenses regularly
Set realistic financial goals
Use the 50/30/20 rule for better budgeting
Save at least 20% of your income

quiz.question: What is a key benefit of budgeting?
options: It lets you spend money without limits
It helps manage income and expenses
quiz.answer: It helps manage income and expenses

title: Credit Scores
description: Understand how credit scores work and improve yours.
coreConcepts: Payment history is the biggest factor
Keep credit utilization below 30%
Avoid late payments and defaults
Having a long credit history boosts your score

quiz.question: Which factor has the largest impact on your credit score?
options: The type of bank you use

title: Retirement Planning
description: Plan for a secure financial future.
coreConcepts: Importance of starting retirement savings early
Differences between 401(k), IRA, and Roth accounts
Employer matches boost retirement growth
Withdrawal rules and penalties to avoid

quiz.question: What is one advantage of a Roth IRA?
options: Contributions reduce your taxable income immediately
You can withdraw anytime without penalties
It guarantees a fixed investment return

title: Stock Market Fundamentals
description: Learn how stocks work and how to analyze them.
coreConcepts: Difference between stocks, ETFs, and index funds
What market capitalization means
Long-term investing vs short-term trading
Why stock prices change daily

quiz.question: What is a stock?
options: A loan you give a company
A share of ownership in a company
quiz.answer: A share of ownership in a company
